description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Summer Learning provides enrichment programs and math / literacy instruction to students performing below academic standard. Summer Learning serves 6,000 students of all ages, including adults. Pre-K programs include weekly family engagement sessions and health services.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
